title: What happens with my saved games when I switch to the old client?
body:
Hey,

I want to go back to the old client because the new one is annoying and confusing. But what happens with the games I saved ? will they be deleted?
because there are some really nice games I want to watch again later sometimes.

Thanks for any help.

replies.body: They wont get deleted, but remember you can only go back to your replay files that were downloaded in the same patch as the current one.
